thread.title: Lady GaGa Is Going To Be On RuPaul's Drag Race & Twitter Can't Stop SCREAMING!!
thread.title_full: Lady GaGa Is Going To Be On RuPaul's Drag Race & Twitter Can't Stop SCREAMING!!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Lady GaGa Is Going To Be On RuPaul's Drag Race & Twitter Can't Stop SCREAMING!!
text:
This is HUGE!!
For the first time ever, Lady GaGa will FINALLY be joining RuPaul's Drag Race as a guest judge on the season nine premiere!
Related: Pink Sounds Off On GaGa's Super Bowl Show Haters! 
The songstress made the announcement on Twitter on Tuesday, and even shared a clip of the teaser. See it (below): 
The time has come! I'm joining the girls on the season premiere of @RuPaulsDragRace ! #DontBeADrag #JustBeAQueen üëë pic.twitter.com/XzKcKapsgw 
‚Äî xoxo, Joanne (@ladygaga) February 7, 2017 
The timing couldn't be more perfect!
GaGa scored amazing views for her Super Bowl halftime show and will be getting ready to leave for her Joanne tour in August! Gotta get that promo, right??
So, really we're not surprised Twitter went crazy for the New York native's latest news! Take a look at THE best reactions (below)!
Lady Gaga on Rupaul's Drag Race I'm pic.twitter.com/QkMM8foyx8
